title: Contemporary Computational Methods for Hospitality and Tourism
text:
Preface
This is a Quarto book.

Time series analysis:

Time series description/examination
Time series forecast

Multivariate analysis:

Causal relationship between variables
Structural Equations

Network analysis:

Dynamics of external digital transformation networks

Machine learning/BD:

Prices in Hospitality
Customer satisfaction

Agent-based modeling:

Overtourism

Geographical inteligence:

Hotel location optimization

title: 1  Introduction
text:
This is a book created from markdown and executable code.
See Knuth (1984) for additional discussion of literate programming.

1 + 1

[1] 2






Knuth, Donald E. 1984. “Literate Programming.” Comput. J. 27 (2): 97–111. https://doi.org/10.1093/comjnl/27.2.97.

title: 2  Summary
text:
In summary, this book has no content whatsoever.
